title: Business Case Workshop for Ethical Decision-Making and Critical Thinking Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Decision-making experience within organizations and understanding of basic ethical concepts
context.additional_context: Intensive training aimed at cultivating the ability to resolve ethical dilemmas from diverse stakeholder perspectives by current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify ethical issues by analyzing business cases and apply at least three decision-making criteria
Learners can present balanced solutions considering conflicting stakeholder demands in uncertain situations
Learners can predict and evaluate potential outcomes of ethical decisions using critical thinking frameworks
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
